body.p: Your petitioners members of the late Jury upon the trial of Jonathan Greer indicted and tried at the present term of the Christian Circuit Court respectfully request your excellency to interpose in his behalf believing his case presents fair claims for the exercise of executive clemency --

Richd. Durrett 1
G. W. Foster 2
B. F. Woodward 3
Jas Brame 4
Peter, T, Fox 5
Clark Willis 6
R C Garnett 7
James Willis 8
Wm Bronaugh 9
John Adams 10
george wolf 11
James T Garnett 12
The persons whose names appear above marked from 1 to Eleven ^Twelve^ inclusive were Jurors in the Case above mentioned

Att John C Latham Clk
Christian Circuit Court
